sentences.en: Believers have promised to serve God and therefore they cannot give unreserved service to some - one else.
sentences.cn: 信徒已应许侍奉神,因此他们不能无限地侍奉别的人.

sentences.en: Charles displays unreserved admiration for his grandfather.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯从不掩饰他对祖父的景仰。

sentences.en: Do I have your unreserved attention?
sentences.cn: 你是完全听着我说话呢 吗 ?

sentences.en: He offered us his unreserved apologies.
sentences.cn: 他诚恳地向我们道了歉。

sentences.en: He was lively and unreserved, danced every dance.
sentences.cn: 他生气勃勃,为人又不拘泥, 每一场舞都少不了要跳.

sentences.en: Our unreserved service, unrivalled quality and unbeatable price in order to our and to our reputation.
sentences.cn: 我们以优质的服务 、 过硬的质量、优惠的价格在同行业中赢得了赞誉.

sentences.en: Ritchie is co - founder of Ritchie Bros Auctioneers, of Canada , which made its name on unreserved auctions.
sentences.cn: 该公司就是因无底价拍卖而出的名.

sentences.en: These actions, which have aroused universal and unreserved disapPageRankoval, must nevertheless give us a pause.
sentences.cn: 这些行动, 虽已激起普遍而毫不掩饰的反对, 却也使我们举棋不定.

sentences.en: These actions, which have aroused universal and unreserved disapproval, must nevertheless give us a pause.
sentences.cn: 些行动, 虽已激起普遍而毫不掩饰反对, 却也使我们举棋不定.

sentences.en: We alwayskeep a few unreserved tables.
sentences.cn: 我们总留几张桌子不预订出去.

sentences.en: We found some unreserved seats on the train.
sentences.cn: 我们在火车上找到几个没被预订的座位。

words.tran_cn: 不隐瞒的；坦白的；无限制的；未被预订的

trans.tran_cn: 未保留的，无保留的，坦率的
